climatePledgeFriendly.details: Cradle to Cradle Certified products are made with safer materials and responsible processes to positively impact people and our planet. SILVER ACHIEVEMENT LEVEL

features: Gentle Face Toner: Alcohol-free and formulated to soothe, tone, hydrate, and balance the pH level of skin; This face toner helps reduce the look of pores, balance oily skin, and maintain the skin's moisture barrier
98 Percent Natural Origin Ingredients: Made with certified organic Witch Hazel grown and harvested exclusively for Thayers on a family farm in Connecticut, and certified organic Aloe Vera

Unique Formulation: Thayers Witch Hazel extract is farm-to-bottle. It's picked by hand and made the old-fashioned way (via maceration) using water only and NEVER touching alcohol; Dermatologist tested for safety and 100 Percent cruelty free

Proven Results: In just one use of this face toner, skin feels nourished, healthier, skin tone appears even, and skin is hydrated all day long. After one week of use, pores look reduced, skin looks clarified, and skin texture looks smoother. Non-comedogenic.

Time Tested Remedies: We're committed to excellence with our formulas, featuring classic ingredients we've used for nearly two centuries; Thayers elixirs have been a fixture in medicine cabinets for generations, once you use them, you'll know why
body.description: Stay Cool as a Cucumber, Whatever the Weather. Thayers Alcohol-Free Cucumber Witch Hazel Toner with Aloe Vera features essence of cucumber, filet of aloe vera, and our proprietary Witch Hazel extract. It has a deliciously serene effect on the face and body. Experience our formula for serenity now! Cucumber is packed with Vitamin C and caffeic acid, which are key in soothing the skin by reducing puffiness and irritation. Antioxidants in cucumbers diminish clogged pores and help fade dark circles under eyes, blemishes, and scarring. Vitamin B-5 in cucumbers also help to retain moisture in the skin, allowing for your skin to feel fresh all day. Thayers creates the only Witch Hazel products made of non-distilled extract from the Witch Hazel shrub, maintaining the highest levels of therapeutic tannins, the mild antioxidants that help your skin look and feel its best. These natural elixirs have been a fixture in medicine cabinets for generations. Once you use them, you’ll know why.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This stuff is amazing!
reviews.reviewText: I have started a cult following of this brand and scent of witch hazel. !! Not even kidding.I started using it years ago. I use a mild soap to wash my face then I moisen a cotton pad with Thayer's witch hazel (always the rose!!) and cleanse/tone my skin. It tingles a little bit but feels so nice and hydrating!I use it on my skin every single day. I use it on a sunburn. I used it after I shave.I got my mom addicted, she started noticing how it made my skin look and feel, so maturing you wanted to know what I was doing!!It started tightening up her face and giving it more of a glow! She was hooked!I got two of my friends addicted!My sister's and sister-in-laws love it and have noticed a youthful glow to their skin.I even got my man addicted to it! After years of harsh sun and little to no moisturizing ... It has brought back his skin to a nice healthy looking glow. He swears by it and tells people about it too!It hydrates and makes you feel clean!!! You should start to notice a glow for awhile of consist use. Consist use over time is key!These things take time.... But I can say, after 10 years of use... And creating a following, shall we say.. cult of Thayer's Witch Hazel lovers!!! I would recommend this to anyone!I have watched people who are acne prone, people with skin issues of all kinds slowly clear up, over time, and start looking healthier. It cant fix everything... But it certainly improves and helps!Can you tell that I am addicted??Try it for yourself. Use it everyday for at least a month or two.Don't limit it to your face either!!I use it on camping trips to cleanse my face when water is limited, I also use it on my arms and legs.Ladies, use it on your collarbone to keep your skin from prematurely aging. Moisture after.I use it to sooth bug bites, itchy skin... Dry skin... You name it, I've probably tried it.I recommend the rose witch hazel. Best smell... Best feel... Best.Just buy it already!! Or I'll have to keep writing long reviews about it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Refreshing! & Gentle Cleansing!
reviews.reviewText: I am a long time user of Thayer’s toner and realized I’d never reviewed it because I initially purchased it from drug stores. Since I ordered this one on Amazon, I decided to share the benefits I experience using this toner.The big thing is that it doesn’t dry my facial skin like so many other toners, which is not just because it is alcohol free. It is said that the first 5 ingredients of a product is the bulk of that product. When you read the first 5 ingredients of this Witch Hazel, it is understandable why it provides such a satisfying result.It is the best prep ever for my moisturizers and serums, helping to absorb them deeply into the skin.One glance at your cotton ball after applying and you see the resistant oily residue it removes even after washing your face, yet leaving your face refreshed instead of that dried out feeling. With its subtle pleasant scent, and care of my very sensitive skin, I love Thayers and highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very gentle and effective
reviews.reviewText: This product is very gentle on your skin. I use it after my shower. I put some on a cotton pad and dab it all over my face. It's soothing and yet moisturizes my skin. Well worth the money for a product that works. This product also has a good reputation. It's important for me to use good products with a reasonable price. This is one example. Good product and reputation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An Essential Partner to My Skincare Routine: Thayers Rose Petal Witch Hazel Facial Toner
reviews.reviewText: Having been a faithful user of Thayers Alcohol-Free, Hydrating Rose Petal Witch Hazel Facial Toner with Aloe Vera Formula for 5-6 years, I can confidently attest to its significant benefits on my skin. This toner stands as a gentle yet effective staple in my daily skincare routine, using a cotton pad to sweep it across my face. Remarkably, this toner holds the power to pick up even the stubborn dirt and impurities that my cleanser sometimes misses, leaving my skin feeling immaculately clean and fresh.One striking feature of Thayers' toner is its unique formulation - it's truly a testament to the brand's commitment to natural, organic ingredients. The Witch Hazel in the toner is organically grown on a family farm in Connecticut and made the old-fashioned way - without touching alcohol. This alcohol-free nature of the toner is such a relief to my skin; it never feels irritated or overly dried out. Coupled with certified organic Aloe Vera, this toner is a nurturing force, soothing, hydrating, and restoring balance to my skin's pH levels.The results I've noticed are remarkable. Not only does it help maintain my skin's moisture barrier, but it also supports the reduction of my pores and balances my naturally oily skin. The texture of my skin has improved considerably – it feels smoother and appears brighter than it has ever been. And, the non-comedogenic property ensures that it never leads to any clogged pores or breakouts.The added touch of rose petals gives this toner a pleasant scent, which I find incredibly refreshing. Every application feels like a mini spa session at home, leaving me with a lingering feeling of rejuvenation and freshness. Not to mention, my skin stays moisturized and non-itchy all day long.Thayers Rose Petal Witch Hazel Facial Toner is my skincare's best friend. Its gentle, effective formulation, which works amazingly to remove excess oil, dirt and maintaining hydration, makes it an indispensable part of my routine. As a frequent business traveler, this toner has proven to be a dependable travel partner. Its easy availability on Amazon allows me to order it ahead of my arrival, ensuring that it's ready for me at my hotel when I check-in. This convenience ensures my skincare routine never misses a beat, no matter where I am.I recommend it to anyone seeking a toner that's not only effective but is also crafted mindfully, keeping skin's well-being at the heart of its formulation. It's a product truly worth investing in for your skin's health and vitality.

Ok, I'll admit, I had no idea what this product was supposed to do when I purchased it but the ingredients were promising and I certainly need help the the oil and ph balance in my face so I purchased a bottle to try. I like the subtle cucumber scent, it blends well with my Olay body wash. I cannot say this product does much for my dry patches but with my skin condition I doubt anything will. What I like is even after a thorough cleansing, applying this product will pick up any residue you did not know you have. It leaves my face feeling refreshed and alive. I like to let it work its way through my eyebrows, then apply to my eyelids to refresh my tired eyes. The perfect way to wake up your face in the morning and refresh yourself during the day.

I’ve been using this product for years now. I’m due to purchase another bottle because the one I ordered is basically almost finished. I love how it doesn’t dry out my face, and makes my skin feel refreshed! I I followup with a serum and moisturizer

reviews.reviewTitle: THAYERS Witch Hazel Rose Petal Face Toner - Nature's Elixir for Gentle and Refreshed Skin! 🌹🍃
reviews.reviewText: THAYERS Alcohol-Free Witch Hazel Rose Petal Face Toner is a beloved skincare product renowned for its natural ingredients and gentle properties. With a combination of witch hazel, aloe vera, and rose petal extract, this toner offers a refreshing and soothing experience for all skin types.Pros:1. **Natural Ingredients**: THAYERS takes pride in using natural ingredients that are gentle on the skin. Witch hazel, aloe vera, and rose petal extract work together to cleanse, hydrate, and refresh your skin.2. **Alcohol-Free**: Unlike many toners that contain alcohol, this product is alcohol-free, ensuring it won't dry out or irritate your skin.3. **Soothing and Calming**: The rose petal extract provides a soothing and calming effect, making it ideal for sensitive or irritated skin.4. **Versatile**: Suitable for all skin types, this toner can be used as part of your daily skincare routine to remove impurities, balance skin pH, and prepare your skin for further skincare products.5. **Generous Size**: The 355mL (12 fl oz) bottle offers excellent value, as a little goes a long way. It will last you for an extended period.Cons:1. **Scent**: While many love the natural rose petal scent, some individuals may find it strong. However, the scent typically dissipates quickly after application.In conclusion, THAYERS Alcohol-Free Witch Hazel Rose Petal Face Toner is a skincare gem that combines the best of nature's ingredients to cleanse, refresh, and soothe your skin. Its gentle formulation and alcohol-free nature make it suitable for daily use, even for those with sensitive skin.Considering its natural goodness, effectiveness, and generous size, I confidently rate THAYERS Alcohol-Free Witch Hazel Rose Petal Face Toner with a perfect five stars. It's a must-have addition to your skincare routine, leaving your skin feeling revitalized and pampered with every use.
